thread.title: Yankees ‘are on the same page and that page is drinking’
thread.title_full: Yankees ‘are on the same page and that page is drinking’ | New York Post

author: Justin Terranova
title: Yankees ‘are on the same page and that page is drinking’
text:
Yankee catcher @JRMurphy513 honestly sums up the Yankees celebration. pic.twitter.com/mED9daKgx6 
— Jimmy Traina (@JimmyTraina) October 2, 2015 

The Yankees celebrated their playoff berth as all baseball teams do.
This sometimes can lead to inadvertently hilarious clubhouse interviews. John Ryan Murphy provided one of those Thursday night after the Yankees locked up a wild-card spot.
Kudos to YES Network’s Meredith Marakovitz for not getting distracted by the answer.
Here’s another portion of the interview, where Murphy makes sure to answer in complete sentences, despite some “uppits” and downs:
